data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea mariana (Black spruce) from sample CAPOTPMA-102

Exposition E, Slope 2 deg, Geology: Sand, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 30%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Hom. PCMA-Wald mit wenig Jungwuchs. Feucht, Film number: 820A
